item.title: A personal Repo - Movies, Art and Things to Do

item.description:
This is a personal post where I keep some personal activities/places I am aim to visit at some point.

I am further structuring this post. I am adding a movie section. Moreover, I will start to briefly write some memories and personal thoughts for the completed activities.

item.title: Slovak Learning
item.dc:creator: Marco Hassan
item.description:
Ok. This post is likely not interesting for any visitor. I am learning the language and after a discussion with my girlfriend it turned out I rather write down the new vocabulary for learning the language the fastest.

In this post I write down my progress and I can go back to it at later stages.
